snippet.title: IN-GAME SCENE Trailer | Ninja Must Die
snippet.description:
JUST ENJOY SAVOUR VISUALS!
Our game features an ink wash painting visual style. All Ninja realm’s landscapes are full of vitality. Immerse yourself in this ink world and enjoy a lingering refreshing sense of combat.

Ninja Must die, a ninja, real-time combat, running mobile game, launches in 2022. Pre-registration IS NOW LIVE!! 

Pre-register here:
https://www.pandadagames.com/en

Official Website:
https://www.pandadagames.com
App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ninja-must-die/id1628517224
Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pandadagames.ninja.global
